items.title: Judicial Org Ignored Threats To Judges Until ‘Threats’ Affected Constitution Haters
items.description: There are too many examples of judicial corruption for anyone to believe the judiciary is the one segment in the world free of malfeasance.

items.title: A Battle Over Election Administration Is Brewing In Arizona’s Largest County
items.description: 'In [2024], the voters of Maricopa County sent a clear message: they want leaders who will implement efficient and trustworthy election reforms.'

items.title: Making English Our National Language Is One Step Toward A More Unified Country
items.description: Expecting everyone to speak English is a recognition of reality and a signpost for new Americans seeking to assimilate and prosper.

items.title: How A Broken Medicaid System Kills Vulnerable Patients Like Carl DeBrodie
items.description: A recent expose of Missouri's treatment of individuals with developmental disabilities highlights the flaws of our health care system.
